meanings.sent1: After her divorce, she remarried her high school sweetheart.
meanings.sent2: My aunt remarried after her husband passed away.
meanings.sent3: The couple remarried in a beautiful ceremony by the beach.
meanings.sent4: Their love for each other was so strong that they remarried every year on their anniversary.
meanings.sent5: He decided to remarried because he couldn't imagine life without her.

meanings.definition: To enter into a marriage with a person one has been married to before
meanings.sent1: They remarried after realizing they still loved each other deeply.
meanings.sent2: Having remarried his ex-wife, he was determined to make things work this time.
meanings.sent3: It was like a romantic movie plot when they remarried at the same venue where they first got married.
meanings.sent4: Their decision to remarried was met with mixed reactions from their friends and family.
meanings.sent5: She felt a sense of comfort and familiarity when she remarried her first husband.
